title: Photograph, "View of the chancel of an unidentified church", 1904–13
title_raw: View of the chancel of an unidentified church
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Interior of a chapel, with arched wooden ceiling, wooden railing, and blind screen behind the altar. An angel, kneeling, on the screen, at either side of the tabernacle. Five-panelled stained glass window above. Shrine to the Virgin, left, with flowers, candles, and lace canopy.

Same church as 1961-83-11.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "View of the chancel of an unidentified church", 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-10.
